pageTitle: Buses will replace Bakerloo line services

title.title: Buses will replace Bakerloo line services

texts: Due to Network Rail engineering work, buses will replace London Underground Bakerloo line services between Queen's Park and Willesden Junction and Silverlink Metro train services between Euston and Willesden Junction on Sunday 25 July.
Between 1200 and 2000 there will be a reduced service in the central London area with a train about every four minutes.
Silverlink Metro will operate every 15 minutes between Willesden Junction and Harrow & Wealdstone.
A rail replacement bus service will operate between Queen's Park/ Euston and Willesden Junction calling at all intermediate stations.
Customers are advised to allow an extra 30 minutes to complete their journey, especially those wishing to make last train connections.
If travelling between the following stations and central London, the following alternatives may be more convenient:

{"template":"table","rows":[["Harrow \u0026 Wealdstone","Silverlink County services to/ from Euston, for which LUL tickets will be valid"],["Harrow \u0026 Wealdstone","Metropolitan line services to/from Harrow-on-the-Hill"],["Kenton","Metropolitan line services to/from Northwick Park"],["South Kenton","Metropolitan services to/from Preston Road"],["North Wembley","Metropolitan or Jubilee line services to/from Wembley Park"],["Wembley Central","Metropolitan or Jubilee line services to/from Wembley Park"],["Wembley Central","Piccadilly line services to/from Sudbury Town or Alperton"],["Stonebridge Park","Piccadilly line services to/from Alperton"],["Harlesden","Central line services to/from North Acton"],["Willesden Junction","Central line services to/from North Acton"],["Kensal Green","Metropolitan (Hammersmith \u0026 City) line services to/from Ladbroke Grove"]]}
For 24-hour information on all London travel, please call: 020 7222 1234
